bug.author: saahiluppal
bug.description:
Hey, I'm encountering this particular error 2020-09-28 15:11:52.110052: I tensorflow/stream_executor/platform/default/dso_loader.cc:48] Successfully opened dynamic library libcudart.so.10.1 Initializing Device: cuda Number of params: 44481793 GPU available: True, used: True TPU available: False, using: 0 TPU cores CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES: [0] wandb: Currently logged in as: sahiluppal2k (use `wandb login --relogin` to force relogin) Traceback (most recent call last): File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/wandb/sdk/wandb_init.py", line 474, in init wi.setup(kwargs) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/wandb/sdk/wandb_init.py", line 162, in setup self._log_setup(settings) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/wandb/sdk/wandb_init.py", line 289, in _log_setup delete=True, File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/wandb/sdk/wandb_init.py", line 224, in _safe_symlink os.rename(tmp_name, name) IsADirectoryError: [Errno 21] Is a directory: 'latest-run.488' -> 'latest-run' wandb: ERROR Abnormal program exit Traceback (most recent call last): File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/wandb/sdk/wandb_init.py", line 474, in init wi.setup(kwargs) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/wandb/sdk/wandb_init.py", line 162, in setup self._log_setup(settings) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/wandb/sdk/wandb_init.py", line 289, in _log_setup delete=True, File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/wandb/sdk/wandb_init.py", line 224, in _safe_symlink os.rename(tmp_name, name) IsADirectoryError: [Errno 21] Is a directory: 'latest-run.488' -> 'latest-run'
The above exception was the direct cause of the following exception:
Traceback (most recent call last): File "main.py", line 103, in <module> main(config) File "main.py", line 98, in main trainer.fit(model, datasource) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/pytorch_lightning/trainer/states.py", line 48, in wrapped_fn result = fn(self, *args, **kwargs) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/pytorch_lightning/trainer/trainer.py", line 1073, in fit results = self.accelerator_backend.train(model) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/pytorch_lightning/accelerators/gpu_backend.py", line 51, in train results = self.trainer.run_pretrain_routine(model) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/pytorch_lightning/trainer/trainer.py", line 1167, in run_pretrain_routine self.logger.log_hyperparams(ref_model.hparams) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/pytorch_lightning/utilities/distributed.py", line 27, in wrapped_fn return fn(*args, **kwargs) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/pytorch_lightning/loggers/wandb.py", line 143, in log_hyperparams self.experiment.config.update(params, allow_val_change=True) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/pytorch_lightning/loggers/base.py", line 450, in experiment return get_experiment() or DummyExperiment() File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/pytorch_lightning/utilities/distributed.py", line 27, in wrapped_fn return fn(*args, **kwargs) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/pytorch_lightning/loggers/base.py", line 449, in get_experiment return fn(self) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/pytorch_lightning/loggers/wandb.py", line 130, in experiment group=self._group) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/wandb/sdk/wandb_init.py", line 511, in init six.raise_from(Exception("problem"), error_seen) File "<string>", line 3, in raise_from Exception: problem Here, i'm using wandb logger with pytorch lightning. and here's insight wandb_logger = WandbLogger(project='xyz') trainer = pl.Trainer(max_epochs=10, logger=wandb_logger, gpus=1) trainer.fit(model, dm)

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.88. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/wandb/client>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.
Hi there! Thanks for reporting. We're looking into this.
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/saahiluppal>@saahiluppal</denchmark-link> , what version of the client were you using? Please upgrade to see if this is still happening.
I can confirm that i haven't encountered this issue today. WandbLogger is working perfectly fine with pytorch lightning
